participant_1.name: Emily
participant_1.personality: Cheerful and sociable, Emily enjoys connecting with others and often has a positive outlook on life.
participant_1.background: She has a degree in marketing and works in a creative agency, where she collaborates with various clients to bring their visions to life.

participant_2.name: Michael
participant_2.personality: Curious and analytical, Michael is always eager to learn and ask questions to understand the world better.
participant_2.background: He is a software engineer with a passion for technology and enjoys participating in hackathons during his free time.
